properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 e1 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh precious is the flow That makes me white as snow No other fount I know Nothing but the blood of Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What can wash away my sin Nothing but the blood of Jesus What can make me whole again Nothing but the blood of Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For my cleansing this my plea Nothing but the blood of Jesus For my pardon this I see Nothing but the blood of Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nothing can for sin atone Nothing but the blood of Jesus Naught of good that I have done Nothing but the blood of Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This is all my hope and peace Nothing but the blood of Jesus This is all my righteousness Nothing but the blood of Jesus{/lang-eng}
